definition: crowded/framework for silkworms/gather foliage/bunch/classifier for bunched objects
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: He had on a brand-new pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一雙簇新的鞋子。

sentences.english: Let's get out for some fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 我們到外表呼吸一些簇新氣氛吧。

sentences.english: Mine was balky and awkward, brand new, and of a light, common color.
sentences.chinese: 我的卻碩大笨拙，簇新，顏色淺而平凡。

sentences.english: It is only a beginning always.
sentences.chinese: 得勝只是一個簇新的開端。

sentences.english: His own mornings are often new surprises to God.
sentences.chinese: 神本身的清早，在他本身看來也是簇新的。

sentences.english: She got that pair of Tianhuang seal again and noticed that its brocade box had been renewed.
sentences.chinese: 她又找出那一對田黃圖章，發現已換了簇新的錦盒。

sentences.english: Pete the cat was walking down the street in his brand-new white shoes.
sentences.chinese: 皮特貓穿着他簇新的鞋子走在路上。

sentences.english: Seacrest Villa Phase IV full sea view flat with new and cozy decoration.
sentences.chinese: 浪翠四期低層兩房單邊全海景，簇新舒適裝修。

sentences.english: The rising sun suggests a brand new day has come.
sentences.chinese: 東昇的太陽證實簇新的一天已經來臨。

definition: long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
